animeDescription: The final DVD volume contains two specials:  Tokimeki no Yuuki Episode 18 (sometimes labeled 17.5), which was never broadcast on TV. It features the swim captain, Utsumi Koayu.  Tokimeki no Sentaku Episode 25.5, a recap of all episodes but the last, which was initially displayed at the Konami booth for the Tokyo International Anime Fair in 2007.
animeCharacters: ['Amamiya, Sayuri', 'Aoba, Riku', 'Kasuga, Tsukasa', 'Yayoi, Mina', 'Yagen, Ryuichi', 'Kinosaki, Fumihiko', 'Watatake, Haruka', 'Vice Principal', 'Utami, Hiromi', "Matsuoka, Jun'ya"]
